title: With the Client Access method, Verify that Proxy  rely inline Conn Info to determine the SSL certificate when we does not select "Force SSL Certificate on NSClient" option on SSL decryption policy
custom_summary: With the Client Access method, Verify that Proxy  rely inline Conn Info to determine the SSL certificate when we does not select "Force SSL Certificate on NSClient" option on SSL decryption policy
custom_expected: With the option disabled proxy should determine the certificate based on the inline conn info and if the option is enabled we should not rely inline conn info to determine the certificate
